mapper.select: SELECT S.SAL_NO, S.SAL_DATE, E.EMP_NM, C.CT_NM, IC.IT_NM, S.SAL_MONEY_TYPE, S.SAL_AMT, P.PT_SAVE, P.PT_DD, S.SAL_MEMO FROM SALE S INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON S.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN CUSTOMER C ON S.CT_NO = C.CT_NO INNER JOIN ITEM_CODE IC ON S.IT_NO = IC.IT_NO INNER JOIN POINT P ON S.PT_NO = P.PT_NO
